page.title: 19Possessions-Castle Kennedy
page.content:
We did a survey of household possessions of every house with children between 5 & 12. There were 34 such households in the village. Here are the results.
{WASHING MACHINE...34 HOUSEHOLDS = 100% {VIDEO.............13 " = 38% {FRIDGE............34 " = 100% {FREEZER...........28 " = 82% {TELEVISION........33 " = 97% {DISHWASHER.........4 " = 11% {TUMBLE DRYER......21 " = 61% {MICROWAVE..........3 " = 8% {LAWNMOWER.........33 " = 97% {HOOVER............34 " = 100% {CAR...............29 " = 85% {COMPUTER...........5 " = 14% {HI-FI.............14 " = 41%
